mapper.select: SELECT id, nickName, password, email, inserted FROM Member WHERE nickName = #{nickName}
SELECT id, nickName, password, email, inserted FROM Member WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT id, nickName, password, email, inserted, a.auth FROM Member m LEFT JOIN Authority a ON m.id = a.memberId WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, nickName, '숨김' password, email, inserted FROM Member ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (id, nickName, password, email) VALUES (#{id}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{email})
